content: easy and fun amigurumi video tutorial on youtube perfect for beginners now also available as a free written pattern on https //www mariskavos nl every step is explained in detail in this video tutorial coco the cat is a small project you can make one in 2-3 hours i used catania yarn but you can make this with any yarn please subscribe to my youtube https //www youtube com/diyfluffies https //www youtube com/watch v=a2mn4zhbwla&t=2217s
